caption.p: Line plots corresponding to the contour plots in Fig. 3(c,d). Lattice rotations are plotted along a horizontal line 4.5 µm below the indent (line shown by dotted white lines in Fig. 3(a,b)). Slices 1 and 3 represent the YZ sections drawn 5 µm away from the indent centre, on either side, along the X-axis in Fig. 3(a,b).
